title: What happens after Ian: Craig Fugate explains how disaster recovery has evolved
description: Former FEMA Director Craig Fugate, one of the most experienced disaster recovery experts in the world, talks about Hurricane Ian and how state and federal agencies should view future storm preparation.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Former FEMA Director Craig Fugate, one of the most experienced disaster recovery experts in the world, talks about Hurricane Ian and how state and federal agencies should view future storm preparation.
